attributes.action: Make Everyone Who Own's Or Would Like To Own A Pet Have A Pet License To Try & Prevent Animal Cruelty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am really against animal cruelty, and think is an absolute disgrace that anyone who is anybody can have a pet, and do as they wish with it. It really upsets me. I think that everyone who has or would like to have a pet should have to have by law a licence, and to get a licence they have to be a strong candidate and not some low life person.
